ops.action: Extract logical sections into separate component files under frontend/src/components/. The project follows this pattern (e.g., LayerPanel.jsx).
ops.title: Extract large JSX into component files
ops.trigger: When App.jsx or any component file grows beyond ~150 lines in the az-hp frontend

ops.action: Check the Makefile for existing targets before creating new scripts. Pipeline steps are orchestrated via Make targets.
ops.title: Use Makefile for pipeline orchestration
ops.trigger: When working on the az-hp project pipeline (enrichment, tile generation, etc.)

ops.action: Use the 04_generate_tiles.sh script which wraps tippecanoe. Check pipeline/04_generate_tiles.sh for the current tippecanoe flags and layer configuration.
ops.title: Use tippecanoe for vector tile generation
ops.trigger: When generating map tiles from GeoJSON in the az-hp project
